metadata.title: CVE-2025-1016 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Memory safety bugs present in Firefox 134, Thunderbird 134, Firefox ESR115.19, Firefox ESR 128.6, Thunderbird 115.19, and Thunderbird 128.6. Someof these bugs showed evidence of memory corruption and we presume that withenough effort some of these could have been exploited to run arbitrarycode. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 135, Firefox ESR < 115.20,Firefox ESR < 128.7, Thunderbird < 128.7, and Thunderbird < 135.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
